name: Partypillars
description:
A multiplayer platforming game all about jumping on your friends' heads! Collect cake and grow as big as possible while capturing the zones that appear around the map. While you're big you're slower, but you capture zones faster! Fireballs, powerups and the small arenas maximize the amount of mayhem!

The game is still under development. Follow Krisjet on Twitter, Tumblr or on Facebook for news about the game!

Controllers are recommended!

Controls

Player 1 - w, a, s, d, e

Player 2 - up, left, down, right, numpad 0

Player 3 - t, f, g, h, y

Player 4 - i, j, k, l, o

Space to start or pause the game

Credits

Game design, programming, graphics

Kristoffer Jetmundsen, twitter: @krisjet

Sound design and music

Martin Kvale, twitter: @martinkvale

ChangelogUpdates in v0.5 - 25.11.2014

Features

  • Graphical overhaul on all items and characters in the game, everything bounces and squashes now!
  • A new dash ability is introduced!
  • The objective of the game has changed! The new objective is to capture zones that appear around the map. Capture 3 zones and you win!
  • The crowns now signify how close you are to winning a round. The bigger the crown, the closer you are to win!
